name: Semana Santa
description:
This game is made for fun and for the sole purpose of our internship's game jam. Semana Santa is a short 3D Horror Adventure game based on Filipino superstitions during Holy Week. Players will witness a series of scares while performing various tasks that go against Philippine beliefs

Controls

WASD - movement

left mouse button to interact.

Note: when cleaning the mirrors, keep holding the left mouse button until the interactive cursor in the middle of the screen disappears. Once the cursor(circle) disappears, the mirror is fully cleaned.
